scriptedContentFragment.name: ${resource:Core_ErrorNotFound_Name}
scriptedContentFragment.configuration: <propertyGroup id="options" labelResourceName="Options"> <property id="fragmentHeader" labelResourceName="CF_Title" defaultValue="${resource:Core_ErrorNotFound_Name}" dataType="String" template="core_v2_tokenizedString" /> </propertyGroup>
scriptedContentFragment.languageResources: <language key="en-us"> <resource name="CF_Title">Widget Title</resource> <resource name="Core_ErrorNotFound_Description">Displays an error message that requested resource was not found, and provides a site search form.</resource> <resource name="Core_ErrorNotFound_Name">Message - Not Found</resource> <resource name="Error_NotFound_Description">Unfortunately, the page you've requested no longer exists. Please use the search form above to locate the information you're interested in.</resource> <resource name="Options">Options</resource> </language>
